attributes.action: Allow court appointed resident parents to petition the court to have the name of absent parents who have neglected contact to have such names removed from the birth certificate and be removed of all parental responcibility.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the courts to recognise petitions to have absent parents names removed from a childs birth certificate thus preventing "awkward" but absent parents making interjections into childrens lives for the sake of causing upset and difficulty. A part of this action should include the removal of all parental responcibility to the child.
